context: Amazon operates across multiple business segments including e-commerce, cloud computing (AWS), streaming entertainment, smart devices, and logistics. AWS remains the market leader in cloud infrastructure with 30-33% market share but has faced capacity constraints in late 2025. The company competes in highly diverse markets from retail to technology infrastructure, facing specialized competitors in each vertical.

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Largest brick-and-mortar retailer with rapidly growing online e-commerce presence. Primary competitor in retail sector.

competitors.name: Target
competitors.notes: Strong omnichannel retail strategy competing with Amazon's retail operations.

competitors.name: eBay
competitors.notes: Online marketplace competitor in e-commerce space.

competitors.name: Alibaba / AliExpress
competitors.notes: Major international e-commerce competitor, particularly strong in Asia and cross-border trade.

competitors.name: Shopify
competitors.notes: Powers millions of independent online stores, enabling retailers to compete with Amazon's marketplace.

competitors.name: Microsoft Azure
competitors.notes: Second-largest cloud provider, major AWS competitor. Gaining market share as AWS faces capacity constraints.

competitors.name: Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
competitors.notes: Third-largest cloud provider competing with AWS for enterprise cloud workloads.

competitors.name: IBM Cloud
competitors.notes: Enterprise cloud services competitor focusing on hybrid cloud solutions.

competitors.name: Oracle Cloud
competitors.notes: Cloud infrastructure competitor, particularly in enterprise database and application hosting.

competitors.name: Netflix
competitors.notes: Primary streaming competitor to Amazon Prime Video.

competitors.name: Disney+
competitors.notes: Major streaming service competitor with exclusive content library.

competitors.name: HBO Max (Max)
competitors.notes: Premium streaming service competing for subscriber attention.

competitors.name: Apple TV+
competitors.notes: Apple's streaming service and ecosystem competitor.

competitors.name: Google (Nest, Google Assistant)
competitors.notes: Smart home devices and voice assistant competitor to Alexa and Echo products.

competitors.name: Apple (HomePod, Siri)
competitors.notes: Smart speaker and voice assistant competitor in the smart home market.
